article_title: Peter Crabb: Health care hindered by insufficient technology
article_text:

article_metadata.title: Peter Crabb: Health care hindered by insufficient technology | Idaho Statesman

og.description: Health care costs would be lower if government intervention were reduced and technology were set free, Northwest Nazarene University economist Peter Crabb writes.
